SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.annotations

Annotation Interface Permission

@Target({TYPE,METHOD,PARAMETER}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface Permission
Annotation to specify permission requirements for commands or arguments.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    CompareMode
    compare
    How to compare values (name/UUID/equals/auto).
    PermissionConditionType
    condition
    Structured condition type when the permission is required.
    String[]
    conditionArgs
    Names of arguments that participate in the condition.
    MagicPermissionDefault
    defaultValue
    Default permission state (string name mirroring Bukkit PermissionDefault).
    boolean
    includeArgumentSegment
    Whether to include ".argument." segment before the node (defaults to true).
    String
    message
    The message to display if permission is denied.
    String
    node
    Override for generated permission node segment (defaults to argument name).
    String
    value
    The required permission string.
    String
    when
    The condition when the permission is required.

  • Element Details

    • value

      String value
      The required permission string.
      Returns:
      the permission string
      Default:
      ""

    • when

      String when
      The condition when the permission is required.
      Returns:
      the condition string
      Default:
      ""

    • condition

      PermissionConditionType condition
      Structured condition type when the permission is required.
      Returns:
      condition type
      Default:
      ALWAYS

    • node

      String node
      Override for generated permission node segment (defaults to argument name).
      Returns:
      custom node segment
      Default:
      ""

    • includeArgumentSegment

      boolean includeArgumentSegment
      Whether to include ".argument." segment before the node (defaults to true).
      Returns:
      true to include ".argument."
      Default:
      true

    • conditionArgs

      String[] conditionArgs
      Names of arguments that participate in the condition.
      Returns:
      argument names
      Default:
      {}

    • compare

      CompareMode compare
      How to compare values (name/UUID/equals/auto).
      Returns:
      compare mode
      Default:
      AUTO

    • message

      String message
      The message to display if permission is denied.
      Returns:
      the permission denied message
      Default:
      "magicutils.noPermission"

    • defaultValue

      MagicPermissionDefault defaultValue
      Default permission state (string name mirroring Bukkit PermissionDefault).
      Returns:
      default permission
      Default:
      OP
